mxTextCell.title: Text
mxTextCell.label:
Converter Engine Pattern
The Converter Engine pattern drives
resources flow by converting 2
resources into each other to trigger
a feedback loop that produces
surplus of resources.
mxTextCell.prevLabel:
Converter Engine Pattern
The Converter Engine pattern drives
resources flow by converting 2
resources into each other to trigger
a feedback loop that produces
surplus of resources.

mxTextCell.title: Text
mxTextCell.label:
Static Engine Pattern
The Static Engine pattern provides a steady indefinite flow of
resources over time for player(s) to consume/collect while playing.
mxTextCell.prevLabel:
Static Engine Pattern
The Static Engine pattern provides a steady indefinite flow of
resources over time for player(s) to consume/collect while playing.

mxTextCell.title: Text
mxTextCell.label:
Dynamic Engine Pattern
The Dynamic Engine pattern is same as that of 
Static Engine, yet at least one of the actions is
used to invest the output in modifying the
engine resources flow.
mxTextCell.prevLabel:
Dynamic Engine Pattern
The Dynamic Engine pattern is same as that of 
Static Engine, yet at least one of the actions is
used to invest the output in modifying the
engine resources flow.

mxTextCell.title: Text
mxTextCell.label:
Engine Building Pattern
The Engine Building pattern is a Dynamic Engine,
Converter Engine, or a combination of different
engines form that aid in improving a core engine
in a game like building more units, boosting
production a defined economical flow, etc.
mxTextCell.prevLabel:
Engine Building Pattern
The Engine Building pattern is a Dynamic Engine,
Converter Engine, or a combination of different
engines form that aid in improving a core engine
in a game like building more units, boosting
production a defined economical flow, etc.

mxTextCell.title: Text
mxTextCell.label:
On-Off Switch Pattern
The On-Off Switch pattern acts as a binary
switch that can be utilized to operate
system elements based on player actions.
mxTextCell.prevLabel:
Converter Engine Pattern
The Converter Engine pattern drives
resources flow by converting 2
resources into each other to trigger
a feedback loop that produces
surplus of resources.

mxTextCell.title: Text
mxTextCell.label:
Trigger Gate Construct
The Trigger Gate is used to fire/trigger the action other
another node behavior through a (*) state connection.
mxTextCell.prevLabel:
Converter Engine Pattern
The Converter Engine pattern drives
resources flow by converting 2
resources into each other to trigger
a feedback loop that produces
surplus of resources.

mxTextCell.title: Text
mxTextCell.label:
Label TypeFormatExamplesDescription
flow ratex0; 2; 100; 0.5; 34(x) capacity of resources to flow.
random flow rateDX; yDx; x%D6; 4D3; D5-D7; 30%random range based on dice of (x) faces of resources to flow.
intervalsx|y1|5; D6|2; D4|(D6+2)(x) amount of resources to flow per (y) time interval
multipliersx*y3*4; 2*D5; 3*50%arithmetic multiply operation.
all resourcesallallcapacity of resources to flow is ALL resources.
descriptiondescription: labeldamage: 50; chance: D6+4describe a label textually.

mxTextCell.title: Text
mxTextCell.label:
Label TypeFormatExamplesApplicable to
value modifiers+; -; +x; -x; +x%; -x%+; -; +1; -3: +20%; -5%value modifiers and node modifiers
interval modifiers+xi; -xi;+2i; -3ivalue modifiers
conditions==; !=; x; >=x; <=x; ==0; !=5; 3; >=10; <=1activators and triggers after a gate
range (conditions)x..y1..5; 2..13activators and triggers after a gate
probabilitiesx%; x30%; 4triggers after a gate
trigger maker**triggers
reverse trigger!!reverse triggers
